sources.name: Access to electricity (% rural population)- World Bank
sources.description:
Data published by World Bank, World Development Indicators (WDI)
Data publisher's source World Bank, Sustainable Energy for All (SE4ALL) database from the SE4ALL Global Tracking Framework led jointly by the World Bank, International Energy Agency, and the Energy Sector Management Assistance Program
Link http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/EG.ELC.ACCS.RU.ZS?view=chart
Retrieved 2017-05-29
